question: Analyze the impact of recent IT vendor partnerships on company profitability in the technology sector.

subtasks.task: Identify companies in the technology sector from the CompanyInfo table
Gather data on recent vendor partnerships from the CompanyITPartnerDetail table
Retrieve financial performance metrics including profit and revenue from the CompanyInfo table
Join the data from the CompanyITPartnerDetail and CompanyInfo tables to correlate partnership activities with financial outcomes
Analyze and visualize the trends in profitability pre and post partnership initiation within the technology sector
